protocol.text: Data was RMA pre-processed using the Chipster 2.0 open source platform (pre-set Affymetrix normalization) to generate normalized expression values and to identify genes that show a reliable level of RNA. ID_REF =  VALUE = LOG2 RMA signal
For 30 and 120 minute light treatments, plates were unwrapped and exposed to 120 μmol m-2 sec-1 at 22°C for the indicated amount of time.

Seeds were plated onto Linsmaier and Skoog medium pH 5.7 with 0.6% micropropagation type-1 agar powder. After a 4 day stratification in the dark at 4°C, plates were exposed to 120 μmol m-2 sec-1 at 22°C for 2 hours to initiate germination. Plates were then wrapped in aluminum foil and seedlings were grown in the dark for 4 days at 22°C.
Total RNA was extracted using the RNeasy® Plant Mini Kit (Qiagen) according to the manufacturer's instructions
Biotinylated cRNA were prepared using the GeneChip 3’ IVT Express Kit from 450 ng total RNA (Affymetrix).

Following fragmentation, 12.5 ug of cRNA were hybridized on Affymetrix GeneChip Arabidopsis ATH1 Genome Array using the GeneChip Hybridization, Wash, and Stain Kit according to the manufacturer’s instructions.
Arrays were scanned using a GeneChip scanner 3000 7G (Affymetrix)
